alert.note: Alert for Gove (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 3:21AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Logan and Gove Counties through 345 AM CDT... At 321 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles west of Gove, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Gove around 340 AM CDT. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 86 and 98. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for northwestern and west central Kansas.
